ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: then succeed them with later ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So shall We make the later ones to follow them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We shall cause those of later times to follow them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and make others settle after them in their land?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We shall then send the latter after them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So shall We make later generations to follow them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then did We follow them up with later ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and then follow them with the later folk?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then caused the latter folk to follow after?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We will now cause the later ones to follow them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thereafter We shall cause to follow them the latter ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [and] then made the latter ones follow them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So shall We make later (generations) follow them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So shall We make later generations to follow them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and let the latter follow them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then succeeded them with the others?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:17] then made the latter folk follow them?, [the latter folk] of those who denied, such as the disbelievers of Mecca, whom We will destroy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then caused the latter folk to follow after) through death and chastisement?
